label: Final Third Influence
description: Offensive output, shot creation, and attacking presence in dangerous areas

label: Pass Security
description: Passing accuracy, completion rate, and reliability in possession

label: Deep Progression
description: Progressive passing, line-breaking passes, and advancing the ball forward

label: Aggressiveness
description: Pressing, tackles, interceptions, and defensive work rate

label: Attacking Output
description: Goals, assists, key passes, and direct offensive contributions

label: Defensive Duel Efficiency
description: Success rate in defensive duels, challenges, and 1v1 situations

label: Carrying & Dribbling
description: Ball carrying, dribbling success, and progression through individual actions
